channel.title: Docker on Scalereal
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Scalereal

item.title: What's this docker thing?
item.description: Building tools for mass innovation Docker is a set of platform as a service products that use OS-level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers. Containers are isolated from one another and bundle their own software, libraries and configuration files; they can communicate with each other through well-defined channels.
